Grit: 13 things mentally strong people won't do

Software Management Consultants, Inc. (SMCI) is a leading provider of information technology talent and technology services. SMCI’s solution options include contract, contract-to-hire, and direct-hire opportunities for a broad range of IT disciplines and platforms.SMCI’s extensive candidate pool and precise selection methodology enable us to match top IT talent to top tech companies for over 30 years and have been recognized as a regional industry leader in the markets we serve.We are committed to building mutually beneficial relationships with the IT professionals and companies that we serve and support. SMCI’s entire team is guided by the principles expressed in our Code of Ethics. Our core business values – integrity, professionalism, and collaboration – are at the heart of everything we do. Our company prospers as a result of our emphasis on long-term results rather than short-term gains.
recommendations: Greg Schillo
Senior Recruiter Oracle Cloud and PCF at Capgemini
May 6, 2014, Greg reported directly to Tammy

From the moment I met Tammy I realized that I was working with an authentic person who could get to the heart of a matter quickly, determine the options for action, and invariably choose the right one. Her ability to see through distractions and to deal effectively with the most important immediate and long-term issues makes her a fine manager and a refreshing person.Tammy and I worked together at CDI for 2 years. She was my direct supervisor. In all that time I never felt supervised but consulted with as a valuable colleague. She took the point on making working life easier and more productive for the members of her team, risking her comfort personally and professionaly at times to do so. She is a courageous person and manager who has what it takes to implement the policies of her superiors, as well as respectfully questioning those policies when she sees that they may be incomplete for the benefit of the business and the persons she manages.Tammy is completely trustworthy and unpretentious, yet with the tact needed to be in positions of reponsibility to others above and below her in an organization. She is a good leader and a loyal follower who is true to upholding the standards of a reputable company, all the while sincerely caring for the needs and lives of those she manages and to whom she herself reports.To use part of her last name to summarize her, she is Wright from the heart and Wright to the heart of all she is and does. I am honored to have worked with her and even more so to call her my friend. If you have a chance to do business with her, good for you. If you have a chance to get to know her, even better!

IT Project Manager at Best Western Hotels & Resorts
July 17, 2010, Ed was a client of Tammy’s

I began working with Tammy and Kelly IT Services in early 2009, while looking for work, and remained with Kelly until early 2010.Tammy and her team at Kelly IT are responsive, know the IT markets, and work with their employees to secure work that fit their skills and experience well.Tammy provides great customer service; she avails herself for questions, posts in on a regular basis, and is always looking for the next opportunities.She also works well with the companies in which she places her Kelly IT employees; she remains in constant contact with her client companies, to ensure she remains "in the loop" in terms of upcoming changes and ahead of the game in terms of what is happening organizationally.I would highly recommend working with Tammy if you are in the position to contract through an agency.  Tammy, and her team at Kelly IT, work diligently to secure and maintain quality work opportunities for their employees, provide great customer service, and balance the professionalism of business with the human element as well.

Greg Schillo
Senior Recruiter Oracle Cloud and PCF at Capgemini
December 27, 2012, Tammy managed Greg directly

I have had the pleasure of managing Greg Schillo for nearly 2 years.  Greg started on my team as a contractor and it was not too long after he began that I could see his value to our team and did everything in my power to make him a permanent employee.He is simply the best recruiter I have ever worked with.  He has a work ethic and level of professionalism that is very rare in today's marketplace.  He is constantly striving to be the best at what he does and he truly cares about his candidates.  He sets the bar to a level of recruiting that I have not often witnessed.  The combination of tenacity, desire, strong technical knowledge and an incredible sense of urgency is what makes Greg the top notch recruiter that he is.He always made his team and myself look good, which as a manager is priceless.  It was truly a pleasure to work professionally with Greg.  I know he will always be the best of the best.

summary: Tammy is a creative, results-oriented corporate executive who is widely regarded as a thought leader in recruiting and staffing. She possesses over 20 years of leadership and hands-on experience in the corporate staffing arena with focused experience in the placement of Information Technology professionals. Her career has been a rising progression of senior leadership positions with some of the premier recruiting and staffing firms in the U.S.  These firms include American Express, Wells Fargo , IBM, Union Bank, Google and Amazon to name a few.Tammy views her clients as something more than just a simple business relationship, but rather a long-term partnership where all parties have a vested interest in successful outcomes. She takes the time to listen to what their needs are or where they may be insufficient in delivering IT talent.  Success is about making the right connections to solve her client's pain.  That could be in the form of internal staff, outside consulting resources or project outsourcing of all sizes.  Being able to identify the need and to implement the solution quickly is essential.
name: Tammy Peil
title: Vice President, Talent/Technology Solutions
